circumstances: On approach to Lupine Airstrip, the crew encountered poor weather conditions with low ceiling, fog and snow falls. On final, he decided to make a low pass and reduced his altitude when the airplane stalled and crashed. All six occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
The crew continued VFR flight into adverse weather conditions and failed to maintain flying speed. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Improper operation of powerplant, 
- Airframe ice, 
- Low ceiling, fog and snow falls,
- Icing conditions, 
- Weather was given via radio by oil company radio operator, 
- Over max takeoff and landing weight.
